comments:
I started with an existing webapp 2.3 version of web.xml and try to change it 
to webapp 2.4 version. I did that through WebEditArtifact class. See the 
following code snippet:

......
model  = WebArtifactEdit.getWebArtifactEditForWrite(webComponent);
WebAppResource res = (WebAppResource)model.getDeploymentDescriptorResource();
......
res.setVersionID(J2EEVersionConstants.J2EE_1_4_ID);

Calling res.isWeb2_3() returned "true". However, calling res.setVersionID
(J2EEVersionConstants.J2EE_1_4_ID) resulted in the following stack trace:

Please try to get the product correct.  If the problem is not in
org.eclipse.emf.*, then it's not an EMF defect.

Hi - I am changing this to enhancement, because we currently do not support
migrating spec versions of the model/project.

Changing the version of the document is only the start as the models possibly
need to be rendered differently.

This bug was moved to 'closed' state, since it is so old and it is assumed really fixed and no longer useful or need further attention. Feel free to re-open, or open a new bug, if this semi-automatic processing was done in error.
